edu.yang.trumpet.dmo

Class User

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.yang.trumpet.dmo.User

  • public class User
extends java.lang.Object
    Basic User unit Every time server receive a user's request, a object of this class will be established Most user action will be performed through the object of this class
    Author:
    daiyang
